Home.metaDescription: Portfolio homepage focused on architecture, projects, services, and collaboration.
Home.headline: Designing scalable systems with clarity and reliability.
Home.subheadline: I build production-ready applications across web, mobile and backend environments.
Home.systemHeroTitle: I design and operate backend systems in production.
Home.systemHeroSubtitle: Containerized Go API, domain architecture, k3s infrastructure, CI/CD, and operational observability. Next.js and Expo interfaces complete the product loop.
Home.panelArchitectureSubtitle: High-level architecture of my current work
Home.panelMetricsSubtitle: Live indicators from the system running this portfolio.
Home.panelCaseStudyTitle: Case Study: This Portfolio as a Production System
Home.panelCaseStudySubtitle: A complete product: frontend, backend, DevOps, and observability.
Home.panelCaseStudyContext: This portfolio is deployed as a real production-grade system. The architecture and metrics below refer to this live system.
Home.caseStudyPoint7: DNS & Security: Cloudflare with a minimal public surface
Home.panelServicesSubtitle: High-impact support across product, platform, and delivery.
Home.panelLabsSubtitle: Ops showcase with live metrics, observability security, and architecture sheet.
Home.restrictedObservabilityNote: Observability dashboards are not publicly exposed. The metrics shown here come from an aggregated endpoint.
Home.askSubtitle: A lightweight assistant to locate architecture notes, project details, and implementation context.
Home.askPlaceholder: Ask about architecture, projects, or delivery...
Home.proofStrip: Go • React Native • PostgreSQL • Production Apps • Remote Collaboration
Home.positioningLine: Open to full-time backend-focused roles (remote or hybrid).
Home.aboutBody: Backend-focused fullstack engineer with an architecture mindset. I build maintainable systems with strong long-term reliability and collaborate remotely from Guadeloupe.
Home.impactPoint1: Led backend Go refactor initiatives to improve clarity and scalability.
Home.impactPoint2: Delivered production React Native features with end-to-end ownership.
Home.impactPoint3: Embedded observability thinking across delivery and operations.
Home.impactPoint4: Prioritized long-term quality over short-term patchwork.
Home.systemSheetLine1: Backend: Containerized Go API, health endpoints, logs.
Home.systemSheetLine2: Cluster: k3s on VPS, namespaces, quotas/limits.
Home.systemSheetLine3: Ingress/TLS: nginx + cert-manager, Let's Encrypt ClusterIssuer.
Home.systemSheetLine4: Observability: VictoriaMetrics + private alerting, aggregated metrics endpoint.
Home.systemSheetLine5: Interfaces: Next.js (Vercel) + Expo as the product interface layer.
Home.systemSheetLine6: Ops: CI/CD, rollout/rollback, runbook kept private.
Home.systemSheetLine7: DNS & Security: Cloudflare, minimal public surface.

ArchitecturePage.metaDescription: System overview of the mobile app, API layer, services, and platform integrations.
ArchitecturePage.title: Architecture
ArchitecturePage.subtitle: A practical view of how client, backend, and platform services work together in production.
ArchitecturePage.comingSoonBody: I am preparing detailed write-ups on scalability, reliability, and product architecture.
ArchitecturePage.overviewSubtitle: Mobile clients send requests through the Go API, which coordinates domain services and platform integrations.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.bullet1: Captures user intent and interaction events.
mobile.bullet2: Consumes typed API endpoints for content and actions.

api.title: API
api.bullet1: Handles auth, validation, and request shaping.
api.bullet2: Routes traffic to domain services with low latency.

services.title: Services
services.bullet1: Executes event discovery, ranking, and lifecycle rules.

postgres.title: Postgres
postgres.role: System of record for relational data
postgres.bullet1: Stores users, events, and transactional state.
postgres.bullet2: Supports query patterns for filtered discovery.

fcm.title: FCM
fcm.bullet2: Supports segmented messaging per audience context.

observability.title: Observability
observability.bullet1: Tracks latency, errors, and dependency health.
observability.bullet2: Speeds diagnosis with correlated telemetry signals.

overviewSection.title: Overview
overviewSection.point1: Single API gateway for mobile traffic.

decisionsSection.title: Key Decisions
decisionsSection.point1: Go API for predictable latency and simple ops.
decisionsSection.point3: Observability by default on every request path.

scalingSection.title: Scaling Scenarios
scalingSection.point1: Horizontal API scale behind a stateless edge.
scalingSection.point2: Async workers for ingestion and fan-out tasks.
scalingSection.point3: Cache + query tuning for read-heavy traffic.

ProjectsPage.metaDescription: A concise overview of portfolio implementation decisions, architecture notes, and shipped capabilities.
ProjectsPage.title: Projects
ProjectsPage.subtitle: A focused look at how this portfolio is built, instrumented, and maintained in production.
ProjectsPage.featuredSummary:
This portfolio is the primary reference implementation.
It combines App Router, API integrations, and observability with production-oriented quality controls.

sofy.summary: Placeholder project for modular workflow automation and cross-team operations.

homelab.summary: Personal infrastructure experiments for reliability, observability, and deployment ergonomics.

apiPlayground.title: API Playground
apiPlayground.description: Inspect core endpoints and runtime payloads used across the portfolio.

aiDemoTool.title: Assistant Sandbox
aiDemoTool.description: Validate assistant prompts and portfolio QA behavior against real project content.

liveMetrics.title: Live Metrics
liveMetrics.description: Read aggregated KPIs from /api/monitoring (CPU, memory, disk, pods, restarts, status).

LabsPage.restrictedObservabilityNote: Observability dashboards are not publicly exposed. The metrics shown here come from an aggregated endpoint.

systemSheet.title: System Sheet
systemSheet.line1: Backend: Containerized Go API, health endpoints, logs.
systemSheet.line2: Cluster: k3s on VPS, namespaces, quotas/limits.
systemSheet.line3: Ingress/TLS: nginx + cert-manager, Let's Encrypt ClusterIssuer.
systemSheet.line4: Observability: VictoriaMetrics + private alerting, aggregated metrics endpoint.
systemSheet.line5: Interfaces: Next.js (Vercel) + Expo as the product interface layer.
systemSheet.line6: Ops: CI/CD, rollout/rollback, runbook kept private.
systemSheet.line7: DNS & Security: Cloudflare with limited public exposure.

HirePage.locationLine: Based in Guadeloupe, available for remote or hybrid collaboration.
HirePage.whoBody: I am a fullstack engineer with a strong backend and architecture core, focused on maintainability, observability, and long-term production quality.
HirePage.bringTitle: What I bring to a team

HirePage.bringPoint2: Ability to deliver in product environments

HirePage.careerBody: Part of my experience comes from a medical environment, where discipline, responsibility, and reliability of execution are essential.
